job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtThe purposeampnbspampampampnbspresponsibilities of the roleampnbspincludeltstronggtampnbspltpgtltulgtltligtDesign developampnbspdebugampnbspand maintainampnbspwebbasedampnbspapplications written in PythonampnbspltligtltligtBe involved and participate in the overall application lifecycle for software applicationsampnbspsupporting our Process Development department including Highthroughput screening Analytics FermentationampnbspBiocatalysis and Downstream processingampnbspltligtltligtCollaborate withampnbspscientists and frontend developersampnbspltligtltligtDiscuss technical and design requirements with manager and endusersampnbspltligtltligtProvide training helpampnbspand support to other team membersampnbspltligtltligtBuild highquality reusable code that can be used in the futureampnbspltligtltligtTroubleshoot and debug applicationsampnbspltligtltligtLearn about newampnbsptechnologiesampnbspltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequirementsltstronggtampnbspltpgtltulgtltligtCandidate should haveampnbspat leastampnbspa masters preferably in Software Engineering or a degree in a quantitative discipline such as computer science mathematics computational biology electrical engineering bioengineering or equivalentampnbspltligtltligtIndustry experience is a plus but not requiredampnbspltligtltligtBiology exposes a plus but not requiredampnbspltligtltligtExperience with programming best practices unit testing CICD etc and version control while contributing to or maintaining large codebasesampnbspltligtltligtExpertise with scripting programming languages Python isampnbspstronglyampnbsppreferredampnbspltligtltligtEnglish spoken written is requiredampnbspltligtltligtChineseampnbspspokenampnbsporampnbspwrittenampnbspis a plusampnbspltligtltligtCandidates must be willing to locate near our facilities in either LafayetteampnbspCalifornia or Hangzhou ChinaampnbspWe are open to a hybrid work modelampnbspltligtltulgt
